    • split

      public void split​(java.lang.String usernamePayed, java.lang.String usernameHasToPay, double amount, java.lang.String reason) throws UserNotFoundException
      Description copied from interface: SplitWise
      Splits a particular bill between the user with username usernamePayed and the user with username usernameHasToPay and saves the reason for this payment.
      Specified by:
      split in interface SplitWise
      Parameters:
      usernamePayed - the username of the user who payed the particular bill
      usernameHasToPay - the username of the user who owes money
      amount - the amount of the particular bill
      reason - the reason of the bill
      Throws:
      UserNotFoundException - if the user with username usernamePayed or the user with username usernameHasToPay is not found in our database

    • splitByGroup

      public void splitByGroup​(java.lang.String usernamePayed, double amount, java.lang.String groupName, java.lang.String reason) throws GroupNotFoundException, UserNotFoundException
      Description copied from interface: SplitWise
      Splits the particular bill among the user with username usernamePayed and the users from group named groupName.
      Specified by:
      splitByGroup in interface SplitWise
      Parameters:
      usernamePayed - the username of the user who payed the particular bill
      amount - the amount of the particular bill
      groupName - the name of the group of users we want to split the bill with
      reason - the reason for this bill
      Throws:
      GroupNotFoundException - if the group with name groupName is not found in our database
      UserNotFoundException - if the user with username usernamePayed is not found in our database

    • createGroup

      public void createGroup​(java.lang.String usernamePayed, java.lang.String groupName, java.lang.String... otherUsernames) throws UnableToCreateGroupException, UserNotFoundException
      Description copied from interface: SplitWise
      Allows the user with username usernamePayed to create a group named groupName of user with username otherUsernames.
      Specified by:
      createGroup in interface SplitWise
      Parameters:
      usernamePayed - the username of the user who wants to create the group
      groupName - the name of the group of users we want to create
      otherUsernames - the username of the other members of group groupName besides the user with username usernamePayed
      Throws:
      UnableToCreateGroupException - if the groupName is already existing or is not a valid group name or if the otherUsernames contains either a not valid username, or a non-existing username
      UserNotFoundException

    • payed

      public void payed​(java.lang.String usernamePayed, java.lang.String usernameHasToPay, double amount) throws UserNotFoundException
      Description copied from interface: SplitWise
      Allows the user with username usernamePayed to note that the user with username usernameHasToPay has return amount he owes.
      Specified by:
      payed in interface SplitWise
      Parameters:
      usernamePayed - the username of the user who payed the particular bill
      usernameHasToPay - the username of the user who owes money and has return the particular amount amount
      amount - the amount of money the user with username usernameHasToPay has return to the user with username usernamePayed
      Throws:
      UserNotFoundException - if the user with username usernamePayed or the user with username usernameHasToPay is not found in our database

    • payedFromGroupMember

      public void payedFromGroupMember​(java.lang.String usernamePayed, java.lang.String groupName, java.lang.String username, double amount) throws UserNotFoundException, GroupNotFoundException
      Description copied from interface: SplitWise
      Allows the user with username usernamePayed to note that the user with username usernameHasToPay from the group named groupName has return amount he owes.
      Specified by:
      payedFromGroupMember in interface SplitWise
      Parameters:
      usernamePayed - the username of the user who payed the particular bill
      groupName - the name of the group from which the user with username username owes money to the user with username usernamePayed
      username - the username of the user who owes money and has return the particular amount amount
      amount - the amount of money the user with username usernameHasToPay has return to the user with username usernamePayed
      Throws:
      UserNotFoundException - if the user with username usernamePayed or the user with username username is not found in our database
      GroupNotFoundException - if the group named groupName is not found in our database

    • register

      public void register​(java.lang.String username, java.lang.String password) throws InvalidUsernameException, InvalidPasswordException, UsernameAlreadyExistsException
      Description copied from interface: SplitWise
      Allow a new user to make a registration in SplitWise with username username and with password passoword.
      Specified by:
      register in interface SplitWise
      Parameters:
      username - the username which the new user has chosen
      password - the password which the new user has chosen
      Throws:
      InvalidUsernameException - if username is less than 8 characters
      InvalidPasswordException - if password is less than 8 characters
      UsernameAlreadyExistsException - if there is another user with username username

    • addUserToFriendsList

      public void addUserToFriendsList​(java.lang.String username1, java.lang.String username2) throws UserNotFoundException, UsernameAlreadyExistsException
      Description copied from interface: SplitWise
      Allows the user with username username1 to add to his friends' list the user with username username2.
      Specified by:
      addUserToFriendsList in interface SplitWise
      Parameters:
      username1 - the username of the user who want to add the user with username username2 to his friends list
      username2 - the username of the user which username1 wants to add to his friends list
      Throws:
      UserNotFoundException - if the user with username1 or the username with username username2 is not found in our database
      UsernameAlreadyExistsException - if the user with username username2 is already added to the user with username username1 friends list
